channel.title: coding on Durban Exploratory Data Analysis Workshop 2022
channel.description: Recent content in coding on Durban Exploratory Data Analysis Workshop 2022

item.title: Figure customization and color scales
item.description: In this session we will change ggplot’s default choices for color and style and take control of final figure presentation. created in R with the ggpomological package Slides Color Scales slides Figure Design slides Compound Figures slides Excercises Color Scales Excercise (solutions) Figure Design Excercise (solutions) Compound Figures Excercise (solutions)

item.title: Data Wrangling and Data Visualization
item.description: In this session we will cover how to build data visualizations and perform data wrangling tasks artwork by @allison_horst Slides Morning: 1. Aesthetic Mapping slides 2. Visualizing Amounts slides 3. Visualizing Distributions slides Afternoon: 1. Data Wrangling 1 slides 2. Data Wrangling 2 slides 3. Know Your Data slides Excercises Morning: 1. Aesthetic Mapping Excercise 2. Visualizing Amounts Excercise 3. Visualizing Distributions Excercise Afternoon: 1. Data Wrangling 1 Excercise
